isSuitable

public boolean isSuitable(Position positionToInsert,
                          ModelTile tileToInsert)
Check if the tileToInsert is suitable in the positionToInsert. More info: tile is suitable if it's near a compatible tile.

getAllPlacedPositions

public Set<Position> getAllPlacedPositions()
Give all the placed Position. A position is in the returned set if has a tile on it.

Returns:
a set of position placed.
